title: Lissandra's actually blind
body:
Just putting it out there.

"Lissandra is blind in the sense that her eyes do not work, mauled by an ursine prior to becoming Iceborn. However, she is capable of sensing her surroundings through ice"

replies.body: I can confirm this to be correct. Every time I take ice, I see things.
Ok ... wtf. U blew my mind.
This will annoy me every time i play against a Teemo or Quinn as her now....
